original_text: So that a man shall say, Verily there is a reward for the righteous: verily he is a God that judgeth in the earth.
korean_text: 그 때에 사람의 말이 진실로 의인에게 갚음이 있고 진실로 땅에서 심판하시는 하나님이 계시다 하리로다

sentences.original_text: So that a man shall say,
Verily there is a reward for the righteous:
verily he is a God that judgeth in the earth.
